## See available models

``` bash
llm models
```

## Alias models for ease of use

``` bash
llm aliases set \
    qwen-2.5 \                                  
    openrouter/qwen/qwen-2.5-72b-instruct:free  # model name
```

## Prompt a specific model

``` bash
llm \
    -m qwen-2.5 \  # model
    "How many 'r's are in 'strawberrrry'?"           # prompt
```
